Name: TC_INVENTORY_001
Precondition:
-User has a valid and active account
-User logged in
-Dashboard opened
Objective:
To verify that each product displays a unique and correct image on the 
Products page.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Navigate to the all items page

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Each products displays a unique image

Name: TC_INVENTORY_002
Precondition:
-User has a valid and active account
-User logged in
-Dashboard opened
Objective: Verify each product name is displayed
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Navigate to the all items page
Observe the product names displayed for each listed product
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Each product name should be visible and displayed correctly for all 
products
